oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hospital requisition form
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Receipt of medicines and hospital stores issued to Sr. Surgeon R. W. Mitchell, Vaughan's Brigade, CSA, ten days before the Battle of Nashville. Written "in the field near Nashville," December 5, 1864, the list includes alcohol, morphine, surgeon's needles and silk, opium, and a large amount of whisky. Dr. Robert W. Mitchell later tended the sick during the 1878 yellow fever epidemic in Memphis. One of his patients was Jeff Davis, Jr. Mitchell is the donor's ancestor.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
